items.sentence: Tom asked Mary to come back later this afternoon.
Tom and Mary want to do that as soon as possible.
Tom and Mary used to live next to John and Alice.
Tom has been driving us everywhere we want to go.
I don't think that very many people will do that.
I don't think Tom did what he was supposed to do.
Getting Tom to show up on time will be difficult.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are all older than you.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are all having fun now.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all went into the cave.
